ingredients.item: 1 x School Of Wok Bao Bun Kit Barbecue (selected stores)
75g Trimmed Mange Tout Peas, sliced into 1cm diagonal pieces
180g pack raw extra large king prawns
2cm piece Cooks' Ingredients Fresh Ginger, peeled and grated

instructions.step: 1. Make the bun dough according to the pack instructions and set aside for 10 minutes. 2. Halve the cucumber and remove the seeds with a teaspoon, then cut into thin batons. Mix in the pickling salts from the kit and 40ml water and set aside. 3. Mix the mange tout, prawns and ginger together in a bowl and stir in the dry rub sachet. Mix the glaze sachet with 140ml water. 4. Divide the dough into 4 and roll into smooth balls. Roll each out, using the reserved dough flour, into ovals around 3mm thick. Brush with a little oil and fold over. Cook the buns according to the pack instructions. 5. Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the prawn mixture for 3-4 minutes, add the pak choi and the reserved glaze, and cook for 2 minutes. Fill the buns with the prawn mixture and serve with the drained pickled cucumber.
